title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4059.2 - Rider must wear approved cap
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4059.2 - Rider must wear approved cap

State Regulations

No amateur rider or jockey shall be weighed out for or
ride in any steeplechase or hurdle race unless the rider or jockey is wearing a
skull cap of a pattern approved by the stewards of the National Steeplechase
and Hunt Association. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4059.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
